content: brighten up your fall decor with this gorgeous textured pumpkin very fun to make and even more fun to give or keep it for yourself i won t tell easy to follow pattern with detailed instructions skill level advanced beginner/intermediate > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog here 1 > the benefit of purchasing this pdf is > an easy to read printable and > ad-free version of the pattern materials needed * worsted weight yarn * crochet hook size g 4 00 mm * fiberfill * tapestry needle for weaving in ends & assembly pumpkin measures approximately 4 5 in width and 4 5 in height pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/textured-crochet-pumpkin/
